name: Disney's Winnie The Pooh: Kindergarten
description: After watching Christopher Robin head off for a day at school, Pooh, Piglet, Eeyore, and friends decide they want to go to school, too. Kids can join Pooh and friends in a learning adventure as they all come together to hold school in the Hundred Acre Wood. There is engaging content surrounding the alphabet, simple arithmetic, and problem solving. The art and voices are reminiscent of Disney's classic animation series The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh.
